text:
"Jared Kushner has emerged as perhaps the most pivotal figure in the national fight against the fast-growing pandemic."

America is lucky to have Jared leading the charge in the war against America's invisible enemy—the Chinese Coronavirus

We will WIN! https://t.co/dTQ2QCbAXS
